Nerangs.ab: … sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō agar gāhānbār bēd maiδiiō.zarəmiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh bēd guftan agar ēzišn dudīgar bēd hauuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi xšnūman ān ī bēd wizārdan agar xšnūman gāhānbār bēd raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd

"At… sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō, if it is a gāhānbār, they have to recite maiδiiō.zarəmiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh. If it is another liturgy, (they have to recite) hauuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca (After) āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi xšnūman they should perform the corresponding šnūman. If it is the šnūman for the Gāhānbār, (they should recite) raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh."

āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca OD sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi xšnūman az ān ī bēd wizārdan ka ēzišn gāhānbār bēd ka-t yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō guft maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca āat̰ dīš āuuaδaiiamahi raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd

"āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca until sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca (After the following) āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi, they have to perform the corresponding šnūman. If it is a liturgy of a gāhānbār, when you have said yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō, (then they should recite) maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca āat̰ dīš āuuaδaiiamahi raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh."

tā ō raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hauuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca tā ō ka yazišn gāhānbār bēd raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe xšnaōθra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca tā ō ka yazišn frawardīn bēd ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm aṣ̌āunąm frauuaṣ̌inąm uγranąm aiβiϑūranąm paōiriiō.t̰kaēšanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm xšnaōϑra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca

"Until raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hauuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca (and then) until passage where when it is the liturgy of a gāhānbār, (they have to recite) raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe xšnaōθra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca Until the passage where when it is a liturgy for for Frawardīn, (they have to recite) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm aṣ̌āunąm frauuaṣ̌inąm uγranąm aiβiϑūranąm paōiriiō.t̰kaēšanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm xšnaōϑra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca."
